name: Messages memory usage exceeds the limit
description: The maximum message memory is almost used up

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check the current memory usage of the Messages region by running the command 'netstat -an | grep tibm'. This will show you the total number of messages currently in use.

 2. If the memory usage is close to the limit, consider reducing the number of messages being stored in the Messages region. You can do this by setting the 'max\_messages' parameter in the tibcoEMS configuration file. For example, if you want to set the maximum number of messages to 100, you would change the value of 'max\_messages' from its current value to 100.

 3. Restart the tibcoEMS server for the changes to take effect.

 4. Monitor the Messages memory usage after restarting the server to ensure that it remains below the limit. If necessary, adjust the 'max\_messages' parameter further.
